summary: A web of intrigue and conspiracy lies beneath the euphoria as the U.S. is about to put a man on the moon for the first time in over thirty years.
cast: Bill Pullman|Lena Olin|Colm Feore|Peter Kent|Barbara Eve Harris|Nicholas Lea|Hrothgar Mathews|Roger Dunn|Benjamin Ratner|Lori Triolo|John Kapelos|Michael Ironside|Scott Hylands|Danielle Juilfs|Paul Magel|Patricia Drake|Paula Shaw|George Touliatos|Keith Martin Gordey|Jenn Griffin|Sean Campbell|Doug Abrahams|C. Ernst Harth|Gerald Paetz|Timothy Webber|Brian Markinson|Matthew Bennett|Bill Croft|Ty Olsson|Kwesi Ameyaw|Keith Provost|Dion Luther|Suzanne Olafson|Jason Low|Joanna Piros|Paul Carson|Phillip Mitchell|Simon Longmore|Kenneth W. Yanko|Michael Puttonen|Brian Leslie|D. Neil Mark|Mark Houghton|Robert Marshall
title: El quinto hombre
